description:
######
Version 1.2.0: In reports added the avg sleeping time.

Version 1.1.0, Added backup feature, now you can send logs to your email, and Fixed the problems in reports.######

  ABOUT

•	The Sleep Journal simplifies sleep data logging.
•	This app will allow you to enter the multiple sleep logs at different time intervals.
•	 This app saves the Sleep time, Date and time and note.
•	This app will allow you to search logs by note.
•	Very easy to use.
  Features:
•	The intuitive interface for data logging.
•	Oversized numbers for easy data entry.
•	This app will allows you to send logs to doctor. 
•	Very simple and easy to use.
